title: Zéfal AFA 8 Plus Clips Multi-Tool In Mini Glove Box Under Any Bottle Cage
content:
French cycling accessory company Zéfal has a new compact AFA 8 Plus multi-tool with a neat little mini glove box mount that tucks in under pretty much any bottle cage. The small flat AFA multi-tool has all the core tool bits you’ll regularly need, plus a chain breaker, and it all snaps securely by itself into a tidy mount on your bike so you’ll never have to dig for a tool to make quick trailside adjustments.

Zéfal AFA 8 Plus multi-tool with its own mini glove box

I always appreciate a good multi-tool and love any accessory that takes advantage of unused space on the bike. This new Zefal AFA 8 Plus setup looks to be a little bit of both. As a tool alone it looks to be a nice compact solution of 4 short bits nested under 4 longer ones, all built into the end of a simple alloy chain breaker.

But it’s the slim storage that caught my attention. The multi-tool snaps securely into a reinforced plastic bracket that bolts either above or below a standard bottle cage, so it’s easy access to get to your tools.

No more digging into a saddle bag to fish out a tool. No need to carry a tool in your jersey pocket. And no more forgetting a tool at home.

Tech details

The Zefal AFA 8 Plus tool itself is an aluminum chain tool with machined steel bits. A flat screwdriver, 2mm, 2.5mm & 3mm hexes fold in first at about 2.5cm long, then over top of those are a T25, 4mm, 5mm & 6mm bits at a bit more than 5cm long. The tool itself is just under 8cm long x 5cm wide, with the 8-12sp compatible chain breaker.

The mount/glove box is made of fiber-reinforced polypropylene, and is 23.5cm long x 5.6cm wide. It adds a few millimeters under your cage (Zefal includes appropriately longer mountain bolts), then tapers to a max 18mm thick where it is sandwiched between the top of your bottle and the frame – or run it under your cage where it will extend at most 15.5cm beyond the lower cage bolt.

Zefal AFA 8 Plus tool – Pricing & availability

Sold as a set of tool + carrier, the Zefal AFA 8 Plus tool retails for 45€ and has a claimed combined weight of 154g. And beyond the 8 bits, plus a chain tool, Zefal also built in a bottle opener too, since you can never have too many ways to open a post-ride adult beverage. Get it now direct from Zéfal of their regular shop retailer network.
